verses.kjv: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, and Timotheus our brother,
verses.web: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, and Timothy our brother,
verses.ct: This letter is from Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, and from Timothy our brother.

verses.kjv: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.web: to the saints and faithful brothers in Christ at Colossae: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: To God's holy and faithful people in Christ at Colossae: May grace and peace be yours from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,
verses.web: We give thanks to God the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,
verses.ct: We always thank God, the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, whenever we pray for you,

verses.kjv: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love which ye have to all the saints,
verses.web: having heard of your faith in Christ Jesus and of the love which you have toward all the saints,
verses.ct: because we've heard about your faith in Christ Jesus and the love you show to all of God's people.

verses.kjv: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel;
verses.web: because of the hope which is laid up for you in the heavens, of which you heard before in the word of the truth of the Good News
verses.ct: This faith and love spring from the hope stored up for you in heaven — the hope you first heard about when the truth of the gospel came to you.

verses.kjv: Which is come unto you, as it is in all the world; and bringeth forth fruit, as it doth also in you, since the day ye heard of it, and knew the grace of God in truth:
verses.web: which has come to you, even as it is in all the world and is bearing fruit and growing, as it does in you also, since the day you heard and knew the grace of God in truth,
verses.ct: That gospel is spreading and bearing fruit all over the world, just as it has been doing among you ever since the day you heard it and truly understood God's grace.

verses.kjv: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant, who is for you a faithful minister of Christ;
verses.web: even as you learned of Epaphras our beloved fellow servant, who is a faithful servant of Christ on your behalf,
verses.ct: You learned this good news from Epaphras, our dear fellow servant, who faithfully serves Christ on your behalf.

verses.kjv: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit.
verses.web: who also declared to us your love in the Spirit.
verses.ct: He's the one who told us about the love the Spirit has stirred up in you.

verses.kjv: For this cause we also, since the day we heard it, do not cease to pray for you, and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding;
verses.web: For this cause, we also, since the day we heard this, don’t cease praying and making requests for you, that you may be filled with the knowledge of his will in all spiritual wisdom and understanding,
verses.ct: That's why, from the day we heard about you, we haven't stopped praying for you. We ask God to fill you with the knowledge of his will through every kind of spiritual wisdom and understanding,

verses.kjv: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing, being fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;
verses.web: that you may walk worthily of the Lord, to please him in all respects, bearing fruit in every good work and increasing in the knowledge of God,
verses.ct: so that you would live in a way that honors the Lord and pleases him in every respect — producing fruit through every good thing you do and growing deeper in your knowledge of God.

verses.kjv: Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;
verses.web: strengthened with all power, according to the might of his glory, for all endurance and perseverance with joy,
verses.ct: We pray that you'd be strengthened with all power, drawn from his glorious might, so you can endure anything with patience and joy,

verses.kjv: Giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light:
verses.web: giving thanks to the Father, who made us fit to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light,
verses.ct: giving thanks to the Father, who has qualified you to share in the inheritance that belongs to his holy people in the kingdom of light.

verses.kjv: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son:
verses.web: who delivered us out of the power of darkness, and translated us into the Kingdom of the Son of his love,
verses.ct: He rescued us from the dominion of darkness and brought us into the kingdom of his beloved Son,

verses.kjv: In whom we have redemption through his blood, even the forgiveness of sins:
verses.web: in whom we have our redemption, the forgiveness of our sins.
verses.ct: in whom we have redemption through his blood — the forgiveness of sins.

verses.kjv: Who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature:
verses.web: He is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of all creation.
verses.ct: The Son is the visible image of the invisible God, the firstborn over all creation.

verses.kjv: For by him were all things created, that are in heaven, and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether they be thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers: all things were created by him, and for him:
verses.web: For by him all things were created in the heavens and on the earth, visible things and invisible things, whether thrones or dominions or principalities or powers. All things have been created through him and for him.
verses.ct: Through him, everything was created — things in heaven and on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones, dominions, principalities, or powers. All things were created through him and for him.

verses.kjv: And he is before all things, and by him all things consist.
verses.web: He is before all things, and in him all things are held together.
verses.ct: He existed before anything else, and he holds all things together.

verses.kjv: And he is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all things he might have the preeminence.
verses.web: He is the head of the body, the assembly, who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead, that in all things he might have the preeminence.
verses.ct: He is the head of the body, the church. He is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead, so that in everything he would hold first place.

verses.kjv: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell;
verses.web: For all the fullness was pleased to dwell in him,
verses.ct: God was pleased to have all his fullness dwell in the Son,

verses.kjv: And, having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself; by him, I say, whether they be things in earth, or things in heaven.
verses.web: and through him to reconcile all things to himself by him, whether things on the earth or things in the heavens, having made peace through the blood of his cross.
verses.ct: and through him to reconcile all things to himself — whether things on earth or things in heaven — by making peace through the blood of his cross.

verses.kjv: And you, that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled
verses.web: You, being in past times alienated and enemies in your mind in your evil deeds,
verses.ct: There was a time when you were cut off from God, hostile toward him in your minds because of your wicked actions.

verses.kjv: In the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight:
verses.web: yet now he has reconciled in the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and without defect and blameless before him,
verses.ct: But now he has reconciled you through Christ's physical body and his death, so that he could present you before God as holy, without fault, and beyond accusation —

verses.kjv: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard, and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven; whereof I Paul am made a minister;
verses.web: if it is so that you continue in the faith, grounded and steadfast, and not moved away from the hope of the Good News which you heard, which is being proclaimed in all creation under heaven, of which I, Paul, was made a servant.
verses.ct: as long as you stay rooted and firm in the faith, not drifting away from the hope held out in the gospel. This is the gospel that has been proclaimed to every creature under heaven, and I, Paul, have become its servant.

verses.kjv: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you, and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body’s sake, which is the church:
verses.web: Now I rejoice in my sufferings for your sake, and fill up on my part that which is lacking of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body’s sake, which is the assembly,
verses.ct: Right now I actually rejoice in my sufferings for your sake. In my own body, I'm completing what still remains of Christ's afflictions for the sake of his body, which is the church.

verses.kjv: Whereof I am made a minister, according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you, to fulfil the word of God;
verses.web: of which I was made a servant according to the stewardship of God which was given me toward you to fulfill the word of God,
verses.ct: God gave me a role as the church's servant, entrusting me with a mission for your benefit: to fully carry out the word of God —

verses.kjv: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations, but now is made manifest to his saints:
verses.web: the mystery which has been hidden for ages and generations. But now it has been revealed to his saints,
verses.ct: the mystery that was hidden for ages and generations but has now been revealed to his holy people.

verses.kjv: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles; which is Christ in you, the hope of glory:
verses.web: to whom God was pleased to make known what are the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles, which is Christ in you, the hope of glory.
verses.ct: God chose to make known to them the glorious riches of this mystery among the Gentiles, which is this: Christ in you, the hope of glory.

verses.kjv: Whom we preach, warning every man, and teaching every man in all wisdom; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus:
verses.web: We proclaim him, admonishing every man and teaching every man in all wisdom, that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus;
verses.ct: He is the one we proclaim, warning everyone and teaching everyone with all wisdom, so that we may present every person fully mature in Christ Jesus.

verses.kjv: Whereunto I also labour, striving according to his working, which worketh in me mightily.
verses.web: for which I also labor, striving according to his working, which works in me mightily.
verses.ct: That's what I pour all my energy into, struggling with all the strength that Christ so powerfully works within me.
